message:
Hi {{ doc.applicant_name }},

Thank you for showing interest in joining {{ doc.company }}! 🎉

To proceed with your application, we’ve created a personalized Candidate Portal for you. Please check your email for more details and complete your profile.

Need help? Just reply to this email and we’ll be happy to assist.

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} Team
name: Job Applicant Registration Mail
subject: You're One Step Closer! Complete Your Job Application at {{ doc.company }}
